GaloyAddressScreen.title: Receive payment by using:
GaloyAddressScreen.notAbleToChange: Awuzukwazi ukutshintsha {bankName: string} iadresi yakho emva kokuba isetiwe
GaloyAddressScreen.copiedCashRegisterLinkToClipboard: Copied Cash Register Link to clipboard
GaloyAddressScreen.howToUseYourAddress: How to use a Lightning address
GaloyAddressScreen.howToUseYourAddressExplainer: Share with someone that has a compatible wallet, such as:
GaloyAddressScreen.howToUseYourPaycodeExplainer:
You can print your Paycode (technically, this is an lnurl-pay address) and display it in your business to receive payments. Individuals can pay you by scanning it with a Lightning-enabled wallet.

However, be aware that some wallets can‚Äôt scan a Paycode such as:
GaloyAddressScreen.howToUseYourCashRegisterExplainer:
Allow people to collect payments via the Cash Register link, without accessing your wallet.

They can create invoices and payments will be sent directly to your {bankName: string} Wallet.

ContactsScreen.noContactsYet: Thumela okanye ufumane intlawulo usebenzisa igama lomsebenzisi kunye nabafowunelwa baya kongezelelwa apha ngokuzenzekelayo
ContactsScreen.noMatchingContacts: Akukho mfowunelwa othelekisekayo uphendlo lwakho ofunyenweyo
ContactsScreen.title:
Abafowunelwa
¬†

feedback: Siyavuyisana nawe. Usanda kufumana ‚Äúisethi‚Äù enye -1!
Ayivumi, nceda uzame kwakhona
Hayi. Asinalo noluncane ulwazi
whatIsBitcoin.question: Yintoni kanye kanye iBitcoin?
whatIsBitcoin.text:
I-Bitcoin yimali yedijithali.

 Inokuthi idluliselwe ngokukhawuleza kwaye ikhuselekile phakathi kwanabaphi na abantu ababini emhlabeni - ngaphandle kwesidingo sebhanki okanye nayiphi na enye inkampani yemali phakathi.
whatIsBitcoin.title: Yintoni kanye iBitcoin?

feedback: Sivuyisana nawe. Ufumene ezinye ezimbini!
Mhlawumbi‚Ä¶ kodwa ayisiyiyo impendulo echanekileyo kulo mongoüôÇ
Ummm....akunjalo!
sat.question: Ndisanda kufumana "Sat". Yintoni iSat?
sat.text:
"iSat"enye yiyunithi encinci ye-bitcoin. Sonke siyazi ukuba iDola enye yase-US inokohlulwa ibe yi-100 yeesenti. Ngokufanayo, i-Bitcoin enye inokwahlulwa ibe yi-100,000,000 sats.

 Ngapha koko, awudingi ukuba ne-bitcoin enye epheleleyo ukuze uyisebenzise. Ungasebenzisa i-bitcoin nokuba unayo i-20 sats, i-3000 sats - okanye i-100,000,000 sats (oyaziyo ngoku ilingana ne-bitcoin enye).
sat.title: Ndisanda kufumana "Sat". Yintoni iSat?

feedback: Siyavuyisan nawe. Usanda kufumana ezinye iiseti ezi-5
Incorrect. Well‚Ä¶ at least not yet ;)
Ayivumi. Nceda uzame kwakhona
whereBitcoinExist.question: Zifumaneka phi bitcoin?
whereBitcoinExist.text:
I-Bitcoin yindlela entsha yemali. Inokusetyenziswa nguye nabani na, nanini na -- naphi na emhlabeni.

Ayibotshelelwanga kurhulumente okanye ummandla othile (njengeedola zase-US). Kananjalo akukho matyala ephepha, iingqekembe zentsimbi okanye amakhadi eplastiki. Yonke into i-100% yedijithali. I-Bitcoin yinethiwekhi yeekhompyuter ezisebenza kwi-intanethi.

 I-bitcoin yakho ilawulwa ngokulula ngesoftware kwi-smartphone okanye kwikhompyuter yakho!
whereBitcoinExist.title: Zifumaneka phi bitcoin?

feedback: Liyinyani eloba I-Bitcoin yenziwa ukuba ibekho ngabantu kwihlabathi liphela besebenzisa isoftware ye-bitcoin kwiikhompyuter zabo kunye nee-smartphones.
Ingcinga ehlekisayo - kodwa ayilunganga!
Asivumelani. Akukho nkampani okanye urhulumente olawula i-Bitcoin.
whoControlsBitcoin.question: Ngubani olawula iBitcoin?
whoControlsBitcoin.text: I-Bitcoin ayilawulwa nguye nawuphi na umntu, inkampani okanye urhulumente. Iqhutywa luluntu oluyisebenzisayo kunye neenkampani kwihlabathi liphela ngokuzinikela,  ziqhuba isoftware ye-bitcoin kwiikhompyuter zabo kunye nee-smartphones.
whoControlsBitcoin.title: Ngubani olawula iBitcoin?

answers: Akukwazeki ukukopisha okanye ukuphinda - phinda ixabiso le-bitcoin
Ewe, unokukopa iibitcoins ngokulula kanjengokuba ukwazi ukopa ifoto yedijithali
Ewe, kodwa ukukopa i-bitcoin kufuna iikhompyuter ezikhethekileyo
feedback: Sivumelana nawe kakhulu!
Asiyonyaniso. Zama kwakhona
Akuvumelekanga. Akukho ndlela yokuba nabani na akope, okanye enze ikopi, ye-bitcoin.
copyBitcoin.question: Ukuba iBitcoin yimali yedijithali, ngaba umntu akanakuyikopisha nje - kwaye enze imali yasimahla?
copyBitcoin.text:
Ixabiso le-bitcoin alinakuze likhutshelwe. Esi sesona sizathu sibangela ukuba i-Bitcoin ibe yinto entsha enamandla kangaka!! 

Uninzi lweefayile zedijithali - ezinje ngefoto ye-iPhone, ingoma yeMP3, okanye uxwebhu lweMicrosoft Word - zinokuphinda-phinda kwaye kwabelwane ngazo. 

Isoftware yeBitcoin inqanda ngokukodwa ukuphinda-okanye "inkcitho kabini" - yemali yedijithali. Siza kwabelana ngokuthe ngqo ukuba oku kusebenza njani kamva!
copyBitcoin.title: Ukuba iBitcoin yimali yedijithali, ngaba umntu akanakuyikopisha nje - kwaye enze imali yasimahla?

answers: Kuba abantu banethemba lokuba nabanye abantu baya kuyixabisa ngendlela efanayo imali
Ngokuba kaloku umama wakho ukuxelele njalo
Ngokuba idolla ixabiso layo lifana nelegolide
feedback: Kulungile. Oku kukuvumela ukuba imali isebenze
Kusenokwenzeka ukuba unayo. Kodwa ayiyompendulo ichanekileyo leyo apha!
Hayi. Ngaphambili ubunokutshintshisa ngeedola zaseMelika ngegolide. Kodwa oku akusekho
moneySocialAggrement.question: Kutheni imali inexabiso?
moneySocialAggrement.text:
Imali ifuna abantu bathembane.

Abantu bayawathemba amaphepha edola epokothweni. Bazithemba iidijithi kwiakhawunti yabo yebhanki ekwi-intanethi. Bathemba ibhalansi kwikhadi lesipho sevenkile liya kuhlawuleka. Ukuba nemali kuvumela abantu ukuba bayirhwebe ngokulula ngokukhawuleza ukuze bafumane okulungileyo, okanye inkonzo.
moneySocialAggrement.title: Imali sisivumelwano soluntu.

feedback: Lonto ilungile. Imali ikuvumela ukuba uthenge into ngokulula, ngaphandle kokungcungcuthekisa malunga nendlela yokuhlawula
Hayi sisidenge, uyazi ukuba ayiyompendulo leyo.
Akunjalo. Oko sikubiza ngokusithwa kwelanga yinyanga üåö
coincidenceOfWants.question: Yeyiphi into eyenzekayo xa imali isombulula?
coincidenceOfWants.text:
Kwiinkulungwane ezadlulayo, ngaphambi kokuba abantu babe nemali, babetshintshiselana--okanye baxoxisane ngendlela yokurhweba ngento eyodwa eyodwa, ukutshintshiselana kwenye into okanye inkonzo.

 Masithi ubufuna ukutya kwindawo yokutyela yendawo, kwaye unike umniniyo umtshayelo. Umnini usenokuthi ‚Äúhayi‚Äù -- kodwa ndiya kwamkela iminqwazi emithathu endaweni yoko, ukuba kuyenzeka ukuba unayo.

 Unokucinga ukuba kuya kuba nzima kwaye kungasebenzi kakuhle kangakanani "uqoqosho lwamashishini"!

 Ngokwahlukileyo, ngemali, unokubonisa ngokulula ibhilikhwe yeedola ezingama-20. Kwaye uyazi ukuba umnini wevenkile yokutyela uya kuyamkela ngokukhawuleza.
coincidenceOfWants.title: Imali isombulula "ukuhambelana kweemfuno"... Yintoni leyo?

feedback: Kulungile. Izinto ezinqabileyo nekunzima ukuzikhuphela ngokufuthi bezisetyenziswa njengemali.
Ayilunganga. Banokuba nexabiso xa bedlala umdlalo -- kodwa hayi kwigama lokwenyani
Hayi. Zisenokuba mnandi. Kodwa aziloncedo njengemali.
moneyEvolution.question: Zeziphi ezinye izinto ebezisetyenziswa ngokwembali njengeyunithi yemali?
moneyEvolution.text:
Kumawaka eminyaka eyadlulayo, uluntu lwaseMicronesia lwalusebenzisa amatye amakhulu kakhulu nanqabileyo njengendlela yemali ekuvunyelwene ngayo.

 Ukususela ngeminyaka yee-1500, amaqokobhe eCowrie anqabileyo (awafunyanwa elwandle) ayesetyenziswa kumazwe amaninzi njengohlobo lwemali.

 Kwaye kangangamawaka eminyaka, igolide ibisetyenziswa njengohlobo lwemali kumazwe ehlabathi jikelele-- kubandakanywa ne-United States (de kube ngo-1971).
moneyEvolution.title: Imali iye yavela, ukususela ekuqaleni kwexesha

answers: Ngenxa yokuba zineempawu eziphambili--ezifana nokuqina, ukufana kunye nokwahlulwa.
feedback: Kulungile. Iimpawu eziphambili ezingakumbi ziquka ukunqongophala kunye nokuphatheka.
Ayilunganga. Oko kusenokuba yinyaniso, kodwa iyodwa ayizizo iimpawu ezintle zemali.
Akunjalo. Nangona ezi zinto zaziphathwa ngokuqinisekileyo, oko kuphela kwakungesosizathu sokusetyenziswa njengemali.
whyStonesShellGold.question: Kwakutheni ukuze kusetyenziswe amatye, oonokrwece baselwandle kunye negolide njengeeyunithi zemali?
whyStonesShellGold.text:
Ewe, ezi zinto zonke zinezinye-kodwa hayi zonke--yeempawu zemali elungileyo. 

Ngoko ke zeziphi iimpawu ezenza imali ‚Äúelungileyo‚Äù? Ukunqongophala: akukho maninzi, kwaye akukho lula ukuyivelisa okanye ukuyikhuphela Yamkelwe: kulula ukuba abantu baqinisekise ubunyani bayo Yomelele: kulula ukuyigcina, kwaye ayitshabalali okanye iwahlukane Iyunifomu: itshintsheka lula nenye into ekwimo efanayo Ephathekayo:

 kulula ukuthutha Yahlukana: inokwahlulwa kwaye kwabelwane ngayo ngamaqhekeza amancinci
whyStonesShellGold.title: Kutheni le nto amatye, amaqokobhe kunye negolide zazisetyenziswa njengemali ngaphambili?

answers: Imali ivumela abantu ukuba bathenge iimpahla kunye neenkonzo namhlanje -- nangomso.
feedback: Lonto ilungile!
Ayilunganga. Nangona oko kunokutshintsha kwixesha elizayo;)
Akunjalo. Nangona abanye abantu besenokukukholelwa oko, le mpendulo ayibhekiseli kwinjongo ephambili yemali.
moneyIsImportant.question: Sesiphi esona sizathu siphambili sokuba imali ibaluleke?
moneyIsImportant.text:
Wonke umntu uyazi ukuba imali ibalulekile.

 Uninzi lwabantu lutshintshisa ixesha namandla abo -- ngomsebenzi -- ukuze bafumane imali. Abantu benza njalo, ukuze bakwazi ukuthenga iimpahla kunye neenkonzo namhlanje - nakwixesha elizayo.
moneyIsImportant.title: Imali ibalulekile kumntu ngamnye

answers: Umfana onomatshini wokushicilela kwigumbi lakhe elingaphantsi
feedback: Kulungile. Urhulumente wase-US unokuprinta imali eninzi njengoko efuna nangaliphi na ixesha.
Ayilunganga. Nangona kwakubonakala ngathi wayesoloko enemali eninzi.
Hayi. Ngelixa abanye abantu besenza iidola zomgunyathi, ngokuqinisekileyo akukho mthethweni!
moneyImportantGovernement.question: Ngubani onokuprinta ngokusemthethweni iiDola zaseMelika, nangaliphi na ixesha abanqwenela ngalo?
moneyImportantGovernement.text: Uqoqosho lwale mihla luququzelelwa ngamazwe-lizwe: i-USA, iJapan, iSwitzerland, iBrazil, iNorway, iChina, njl. Ngokufanelekileyo, kwinkoliso yezizwe zonke, urhulumente unegunya lokukhupha nokulawula imali. EUnited States, iBhanki Ephakathi (eyaziwa ngokuba yi-Federal Reserve, okanye "i-Fed") ingaprinta, okanye idale, iidola zase-US ezininzi nangaliphi na ixesha elifunayo. "I-Fed" ayifuni mvume kuMongameli, okanye iCongress, kwaye ngokuqinisekileyo ayiveli kubemi base-US. Khawufane ucinge ukuba ubunakho ukuprinta iiDola zaseMelika nangaliphi na ixesha ufuna uku-- ungenza ntoni?
moneyImportantGovernement.title: Imali ikwabalulekile koorhulumente

answers: Idalwe ngomyalelo worhulumente weSizwe kwilizwe elinikiweyo.
feedback: Kulungile. Ibhanki ephakathi karhulumente yenza imali yefiat.
Ayilunganga. Ibhanki yendawo inokulawula kuphela imali eyenziwe ngurhulumente ngaphambili.
Hayi. Zama kwakhona!
WhatIsFiat.question: Ngubani owenza imali ye-fiat, efana ne-US Dollars okanye i-Swiss Francs?
WhatIsFiat.text:
Zonke iimali zelizwe ezijikelezayo namhlanje zibizwa ngokuba yimali "ye-fiat". Oku kuquka iiDola zaseMelika, iYen yaseJapan, iifranc zaseSwitzerland, njalo njalo.

 Igama elithi "fiat" ngesiLatini lithetha "ngommiselo" -- elithetha "ngomyalelo osemthethweni". Oku kuthetha ukuba yonke imali ye-fiat -- kuquka iDola yase-US -- yenziwa ngokulula ngumyalelo worhulumente wesizwe.
WhatIsFiat.title: Fiat Currency: Yintoni leyo?

answers: Yonke imali ye-fiat ekugqibeleni isetyenziswa kakubi ngabasemagunyeni bakarhulumente.
Iibhanki zasekuhlaleni zisenokungabi nandawo yaneleyo yokugcina idola
Kusenokungabikho imithi eyaneleyo yokwenza iphepha kuzo zonke iibhili zeedola ezongezelelweyo.
feedback: Kulungile. Mandulo, oorhulumente bebengakwazi ukuxhathisa ukukwazi ukushicilela imali, njengoko bengenasinyanzelo sokubuyisela le mali.
Hayi, ngokuqinisekileyo akunjalo.
Ayivumi. Nceda uzame kwakhona
whyCareAboutFiatMoney.question: Kutheni kufuneka ndikhathalele urhulumente olawula imali ye-fiat?
whyCareAboutFiatMoney.text:
Njengoko kwabelwane ngemibuzo yangaphambili, iBhanki yase-US yiFederal Reserve, okanye ‚ÄúiFed‚Äù.

 I-Fed inokushicilela iidola ezininzi nangaliphi na ixesha- kwaye ayifuni mvume kuMongameli, okanye iCongress, kwaye ngokuqinisekileyo ayiveli kubemi baseMelika.

 Ukulawula imali kunokuhenda kakhulu ukuba abasemagunyeni basebenzise kakubi - kwaye amaxesha amaninzi kukhokelela ekunyukeni okukhulu kwamaxabiso, ukuthinjwa ngokungekho semthethweni kunye norhwaphilizo. 

Ngapha koko, u-Alan Greenspan, owayesakuba ngusihlalo odumileyo we-Fed, ngokudumileyo wathi i-US "inokuhlawula naliphi na ityala elinalo, kuba sinokuhlala siprinta ngakumbi ukwenza oko".
whyCareAboutFiatMoney.title: Ndiyamthemba urhulumente wam. Kutheni kufuneka ndiyikhathalele imali ye-fiat?

answers: Ukushicilelwa kwemali eyongezelelweyo kukhokelela ekunyukeni kwamaxabiso.
Abantu kufuneka batshintshe iidola endala ebhankini rhoqo ngonyaka.
feedback: Liyinyani. Elokuba  iimpahla kunye neenkonzo ziya kuxabisa ngaphezulu kwixesha elizayo.
Hayi. Idola endala isebenza kanye njengamatsha.
Ayilunganga. Nangona urhulumente enokuthi akhuphe imbonakalo emitsha yeebhili, oku akunanto yakwenza nokwandisa imali.
GovernementCanPrintMoney.question: Kuthetha ukuthini xa urhulumente eprinta imali?
GovernementCanPrintMoney.text:
Ewe, wonke umntu makakhathalele!

 Ukwenziwa koshicilelo lwemali karhulumente -- okanye ukonyusa unikezelo lweedola -- kukhokelela ekwenyukeni kwamaxabiso. 

Ukunyuka kwamaxabiso kukukhula kwexabiso lempahla neenkonzo. Ngamanye amazwi, ixabiso lento kwixesha elizayo liya kuba libiza kakhulu kunanamhlanje. 

Ngoko kuthetha ntoni ukunyuka kwamaxabiso kubemi? EUnited Kingdom, iPound Sterling ilahlekelwe yi-99.5% yexabiso layo ukusukela oko yaziswa kwiminyaka engama-300 eyadlulayo. 

EUnited States, idola ilahlekelwe yi-97% yexabiso layo ukususela ekupheleni kweWWI, malunga neminyaka eyi-100 edlulileyo. Oku kuthetha inyama yenyama eyayixabisa i-$0.30 ngo-1920... yayiyi-3 yeedola ngo-1990‚Ä¶ kwaye malunga ne-15 yeedola namhlanje, ngonyaka ka-2020!
GovernementCanPrintMoney.title: Ngubani omele akhathalele ukuba urhulumente angaprinta imali engenamkhawulo?

answers: Yonke imali eyakha yabakho ilahlekelwe sisixa esikhulu sexabiso.
Inkangeleko kunye ne-designer yephepha yebhili luhlaziywa rhoqo emva kweminyaka eyi-10 okanye njalo.
feedback: Kulungile. Oku kuyinyaniso nakwi-USD, elahlekelwe yi-97% yexabiso layo kwiminyaka eyi-100 esiyidlulileyo.
Ayiyo. Nceda zame kwakhona.
Akunjalo. Nangona i-designer yamaphepha eebhili zingatshintsha, oku akunanto yakwenza nexabiso labo.
FiatLosesValueOverTime.question: Kwenzeka ntoni kwixabiso layo yonke imali ye-fiat ukuhambeni kwexesha?
FiatLosesValueOverTime.text:
Kwimbali yehlabathi, kuye kwadalwa iimali ze-775 ze-fiat. Uninzi alusekho, kwaye ubomi obuqhelekileyo bayo nayiphi na imali ye-fiat yiminyaka engama-27 kuphela.

 IPonti yaseBritane yeyona mali indala yefiat. Ilahlekelwe ngaphezulu kwe-99% yexabiso layo ukusukela ngo-1694.

 Akukho mzekelo kuyo nayiphi na imali ye-fiat egcina ixabiso layo ngokuhamba kwexesha. Oku kukunyuka kwamaxabiso. Luhlobo olusebenzayo lobusela lwemali oyisebenze nzima!
FiatLosesValueOverTime.title: Ngaba oku kuthetha ukuba yonke imali ye-fiat ilahlekelwa lixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha?

answers: Imali inzima ukuhamba kwihlabathi jikelele, kwaye inokujongwa.
feedback: Kulungile. Siza kucacisa ngakumbi ngale miba kwiimodyuli zemibuzo elandelayo. Qhubeka ugrumba!!
Impendulo engalunganga. Uyazi ukuba asiyonyani leyo.
Ngelixa abanye benokukholelwa ukuba oku kunjalo, akuyompendulo esiyifunayo apha.
OtherIssues.question: Yeyiphi eminye imiba ekhoyo ngemali yefiat?
OtherIssues.text: Ewe, mininzi eminye imiba ekhoyo ngemali yefiat yanamhlanje. Okokuqala, kunokuba nzima kakhulu ukuhambisa imali kwihlabathi jikelele. Rhoqo, oorhulumente baya kuyibekela imida intshukumo -- kwaye ngamanye amaxesha bade bathathe imali -- ngaphandle kwesizathu esibambekayo okanye ingcaciso. Kwaye nokuba unokuthumela imali, imirhumo ephezulu yentengiselwano iyenza ibize kakhulu. Okwesibini, nase-US, kubekho ilahleko epheleleyo yobungasese, njengoko uninzi lorhwebo luthatha indawo ngedebhithi namakhadi okuthenga ngetyala, kunye ne-intanethi nezinye iinkqubo ezifana nePayPal kunye neApple Pay. Ngaba ukhe wayiqaphela indlela intengiso ebonakala ngayo kwimidiya yakho yentlalo okanye iGmail kwimizuzwana nje emva kokukhangela imveliso okanye inkonzo ethile? Oku kwaziwa ngokuba yi-‚Äúsurveillance capitalism‚Äù, kwaye isekwe kwiinkampani ezithengisa iinkcukacha zakho zemali.
OtherIssues.title: Kulungile, imali ye-fiat ilahlekelwa yixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha. Ngaba ikhona eminye imiba?

answers: Ewe. Akunakuze kubekho ngaphezu kwe-21 yezigidi ze-bitcoin ezenziweyo.
Hayi. Urhulumente unokudala i-bitcoin engaphezulu nangaliphi na ixesha.
Hayi, isoftware ye-bitcoin inokutshintshwa ukuvumela ukuba kwenziwe ii-bitcoins ezininzi.
feedback: Kulungile. Ngokunciphisa inani elinokwenziwa, i-Bitcoin yenzelwe ukwandisa ixabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha.
Impendulo engalunganga. Urhulumente akanalo ulawulo kwi-Bitcoin.
Ayilunganga. Enye yeempawu eziphambili ze-bitcoin kukuba unikezelo lulinganiselwe ngonaphakade.
LimitedSupply.question: Ngaba unikezelo lwe-bitcoin lulinganiselwe ngonaphakade?
LimitedSupply.text: Oorhulumente banokuprinta imali ye-fiat ngobuninzi obungenamkhawulo. Ngokwahlukileyo, ukunikezelwa kweBitcoin kulungisiwe - kwaye akunakuze kudlule i-21 yezigidi zemali. Ubonelelo oluqhubekayo lwemali ye-fiat ludala ukunyuka kwamaxabiso. Oku kuthetha ukuba imali onayo namhlanje ayinaxabiso elincinci kwixesha elizayo. Umzekelo omnye olula: Ilofu yesonka eyayixabisa malunga neesenti ezisi-8 ngowe-1920. Ngonyaka we-1990 ilofu enye yayixabisa malunga nee-R1,00, yaye namhlanje ixabiso layo lisondele kwi-R2,50! Ukunikezelwa okulinganiselwe kwe-bitcoin kunempembelelo echaseneyo, enye ye-deflation. Oku kuthetha ukuba i-bitcoin oyibambe namhlanje yenzelwe ukuba yexabiso ngakumbi kwixesha elizayo - kuba inqabile.
LimitedSupply.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #1: Umda we - saplaya

answers: Ewe. Ilawulwa embindini ziibhanki ezinkulu zehlabathi.
feedback: Ichanile loo nto. Akukho nkampani, urhulumente okanye iziko elilawula i-bitcoin. Nabani na unokusebenzisa i-bitcoin into efunekayo si-smartphone kunye noqhagamshelo lwe-intanethi.
Ayompendulo ifanelekileyo. Nceda zama kwakhona.
Ayilunganga. Sele uyazi ukuba oku akuyonyani!
Decentralized.question: Ngaba i-bitcoin iphakathi?
Decentralized.text: Imali yeFiat ilawulwa ziibhanki noorhulumente - yiyo loo nto abantu beyibiza njengemali "ephakathi". I-Bitcoin ayilawulwa nguye nawuphi na umntu, urhulumente okanye inkampani ‚Äî nto leyo eyenza ukuba ‚Äúinatyisiwe‚Äù Ukungabandakanyekanga kweebhanki kuthetha ukuba akukho mntu unokukwala ukuba ufikelele kwi-bitcoin - ngenxa yobuhlanga, isini, umvuzo, imbali yetyala, indawo yejografi - okanye nayiphi na enye into. Nabani na - naphi na emhlabeni - unokufikelela kwaye asebenzise iBitcoin nanini na ufuna. Ekuphela kwento oyifunayo yikhompyuter okanye i-smartphone, kunye noqhagamshelo lwe-intanethi!
Decentralized.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #2: Ukwabela amagunya

answers: Ewe. Nangona ukwenza i-bitcoin yobuxoki kufuna iikhompyuter ezikhethekileyo.
Ewe. Urhulumente unokuprinta i-bitcoin eninzi njengoko ethanda.
feedback: Leyo yimpendulo echanekileyo. Kwimibuzo elandelayo, uHoney Badger uya kucacisa iinkcukacha zokuba kutheni oku kunjalo!
Ayilunganga. Akukho ndlela yokuba nabani na akhuphele okanye aphindaphinde ixabiso le-bitcoin.
Ayilunganga. Nangona urhulumente enokushicilela iidola ezingenamkhawulo, akakwazi ukuprinta i-bitcoin.
NoCounterfeitMoney.question: Ngaba abantu bangayenza iBitcoin yomgunyathi?
NoCounterfeitMoney.text: Imali yamaphepha, iitshekhi kunye nentengiselwano yekhadi lokuthenga ngetyala zonke zinokuba zezomgunyathi, okanye zomgunyathi. Isoftware ekhethekileyo eqhuba inethiwekhi yeBitcoin isusa ithuba lokuphinda imali ngeenjongo zomgunyathi. I-bitcoin entsha inokukhutshwa kuphela ukuba kukho isivumelwano phakathi kwabathathi-nxaxheba kwinethiwekhi. Abantu abasebenzisa isoftware ye-bitcoin ngokuzithandela kwiikhompyuter zabo kunye nee-smartphones. Oku kuqinisekisa ukuba akunakwenzeka ukwenza umgunyathi, okanye ukudala i-bitcoins yobuxoki.
NoCounterfeitMoney.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #3: Akukho Mali Yenkohliso

answers: I-bitcoin enye epheleleyo. Akunakwenzeka ukusebenzisa nantoni na encinci.
feedback: Ewe. Unokwahlula i-bitcoin kwiinqununu ze-100,000,000. Njengoko sele uyazi, iyunithi encinci ye-bitcoin - B0.00000001 - iyaziwa ngokuba "iSeti‚Äù.
Ayilunganga. I-Bitcoin yahlukana kakhulu. Ungasebenzisa ngokulula iqhezu elincinci le-bitcoin.
Ayilunganga. Nangona eyona yunithi incinci yemali yase-US iyipeni enye, i-bitcoin yahlulahlula ngaphezu kwe-100x.
HighlyDivisible.question: Yeyiphi eyona mali incinci yeBitcoin umntu anokuba nayo, okanye ayisebenzise?
HighlyDivisible.text: Imali yefiat yakudala inokuchithwa kuphela ngokwemali encinci njengepeni enye - okanye iindawo ezimbini zedesimali kwiDola enye yaseMelika ($0.01). Ngakolunye uhlangothi, i-Bitcoin inokwahlulwa ngamaxesha angama-100,000,000 ngaphezulu. Oku kuthetha ukuba ungachitha kancinci njenge ‚Çø0.00000001. Uya kuqaphela uphawu "‚Çø", olulingana neBitcoin "$". Ngamanye amaxesha uya kubona nokusetyenziswa kwe-BTC, endaweni ye-‚Çø. Ngokwahlukileyo, i-Bitcoin inokuphatha iintlawulo ezincinci kakhulu - nezo zingaphantsi kwe penny yase-US!
HighlyDivisible.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #4: Yahlukana kakhulu

answers: Hayi. Yisoftware yomthombo ovulekileyo, kwaye ihlaselwa lula.
feedback: Kulungile. Enyanisweni, inethiwekhi ye-Bitcoin ayizange ifakwe. Phendula umbuzo olandelayo ukuze ufunde ngakumbi!
Kuhle ukuzama, kodwa kuphosakele. Inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ikhuselekile kwaye ikhuselekile - iiyure ze-24 ngosuku, iintsuku ze-365 ngonyaka.
Ayilunganga. Nangona i-bitcoin ngenene iyisoftware "evulekileyo" - okanye ifumaneka kuluntu simahla - isakhuseleke kakhulu.
securePartOne.question: Ngaba inethiwekhi yeBitcoin ikhuselekile?
securePartOne.text: Inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ixabisa ngaphezulu kwe-100 yeebhiliyoni zeedola namhlanje. Ngokufanelekileyo, inethiwekhi kufuneka ikhuseleke kakhulu - ukuze imali ingaze ibiwe. I-Bitcoin yaziwa ngokuba yi-cryptocurrency yokuqala yehlabathi. Inxalenye ye "crypto" yegama ivela kwi-cryptography. Ngamafutshane, i-cryptography ikhusela ulwazi ngemisebenzi yezibalo enzima kakhulu. Uninzi lwabantu aluqondi - kodwa i-Bitcoin ngenene yeyona nethiwekhi yekhompyuter ikhuselekile emhlabeni! (usenokuba ukhe weva nge-bitcoin "hacks" - esiza kuyiphendula kwimibuzo elandelayo)
securePartOne.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #5: Khusela -- Icandelo I

answers: Ewe. I-Bitcoin ihlala iqhekezwa ngeeholide, xa iibhanki zemveli zivaliwe.
feedback: Liyinyani elo. Inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ayizange ifakwe phantsi. Nangona kunjalo, kubalulekile ukusebenzisa kuphela izipaji zedijithali ezikhuselekileyo ukugcina iibitcoins zakho zobuqu zikhuselekile ngamaxesha onke.
Ayivumi. Nceda uzame kwakhona
Hayi sisidenge, uyazi ukuba ayiyompendulo ichanekileyo leyo.
securePartTwo.question: Ngaba i-Bitcoin yakha yaqhekezwa?
securePartTwo.text: Ukuthe ngqo: inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ngokwayo ayizange ikhutshwe. Zange nakanye. Ke yintoni kanye kanye eye yagqekezelwa? Izipaji ezithile zedijithali ezazingenalo ukhuseleko olufanelekileyo kwindawo. Kanye njenge-wallet ebonakalayo ibamba imali ye-fiat (ngendlela yamatyala ephepha), i-wallet yedijithali ibamba isixa se-bitcoin. Kwilizwe lenyama, izigebenga zikhuthuza iibhanki- kwaye zihambe neeDola zaseMelika. Into yokuba umntu aphange ibhanki ayinabo nabuphi na ubudlelwane bokuba iDola yaseMelika izinzile okanye iyimali ethembekileyo. Ngokufanayo, abanye abahlaseli bekhompyuter babile i-bitcoin kwizipaji zedijithali ezingakhuselekanga - i-intanethi ilingana nokuphangwa kwebhanki. Nangona kunjalo, kubalulekile ukwazi ukuba inethiwekhi ye-bitcoin ayizange igqekezwe okanye ifakwe esichengeni!
securePartTwo.title: Uphawu Olulodwa #5: Khusela -- Icandelo II

DefaultWalletScreen.title: Iakhawunti ehlala ikho
DefaultWalletScreen.info:
Pick which account to set as default for receiving and sending. You can adjust the send and receive account for individual payments in the mobile app. Payments received through the cash register or your Lightning address will always go to the default account.

To avoid Bitcoin's volatility, choose Stablesats. This allows you to maintain a stable amount of money while still being able to send and receive payments.

You can change this setting at any time, and it won't affect your current balance.

ThemeScreen.title: Theme
ThemeScreen.info: Pick your preferred theme for using Blink, or choose to keep it synced with your system settings.

StablesatsModal.header: Nge-Stablesats, ngoku une-akhawunti ye-USD eyongeziweyo kwi-wallet yakho!
StablesatsModal.body: Ungayisebenzisa ukuthumela nokufumana i-Bitcoin, kwaye ngokukhawuleza udlulise ixabiso phakathi kwe-akhawunti yakho ye-BTC kunye ne-USD. Ixabiso kwi-akhawunti ye-USD aliyi kutshintsha ngexabiso leBitcoin. Olu phawu aluhambelani nenkqubo yebhanki yesiqhelo.

SplashScreen.update: Usetyenziso lwakho luphelelwe lixesha. Uhlaziyo luyafuneka phambi kokuba i-app isetyenziswe. Oku kunokwenziwa kwi-PlayStore ye-Android kunye ne-Testflight ye-iOS
